languages.text: {n}Старик замирает, повернув голову в сторону и кивая глухой тишине храма.{/n} "Да... Да, из уст твоих правда льется рекою. {mf|Его|Ее} привечаем мы, как того требует Завет".

{n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик замирает, повернув голову в сторону и кивая глухой тишине храма.{/n} "Да... Да, из уст твоих правда льется рекою. {mf|Его|Ее} привечаем мы, как того требует Завет".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man stands still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth is pouring like a stream from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as Ahn'shini demands us to."

{n}The old man stands still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth is pouring like a stream from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as Ahn'shini demands us to."

{n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as Ahn'shini demands."

{n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as Ahn'shini demands."

{n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

{n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann verstummt und legt den Kopf zur Seite. Er nickt in Richtung der gedämpfte Stille des Tempels.{/n} "Ja ... Ja, Wahrheit fließt wie ein Strom aus Euren Lippen. Wir heißen {mf|ihn|sie} willkommen, wie es die Grundsätze verlangen."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann verstummt und legt den Kopf zur Seite. Er nickt in Richtung der gedämpfte Stille des Tempels.{/n} "Ja ... Ja, Wahrheit fließt wie ein Strom aus Euren Lippen. Wir heißen {mf|ihn|sie} willkommen, wie es die Grundsätze verlangen."

languages.text: {n}El anciano se queda inmóvil con la cabeza girada a un lado. Asiente ante el silencio ahogado del templo.{/n} «Sí... Sí, un arroyo de verdad fluye de sus labios. Le damos la bienvenida como exige la Doctrina».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano se queda inmóvil con la cabeza girada a un lado. Asiente ante el silencio ahogado del templo.{/n} «Sí... Sí, un arroyo de verdad fluye de sus labios. Le damos la bienvenida como exige la Doctrina».

languages.text: {n}老人は動きを止める。その頭は横を向いている。彼は神殿のくぐもるような沈黙に対してうなずく。{/n}「そうだ…そう、小川のような真実はあなたの唇から流れ出る。我らは教義が求めている{mf|彼|彼女}を迎え入れよう」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は動きを止める。その頭は横を向いている。彼は神殿のくぐもるような沈黙に対してうなずく。{/n}「そうだ…そう、小川のような真実はあなたの唇から流れ出る。我らは教義が求めている{mf|彼|彼女}を迎え入れよう」

languages.text: {n}老人一动不动，头转向旁边，朝圣殿内的沉寂的空气点了点头。{/n}“是的……是的，真理如同溪流一般，从你的唇间倾泻而出。我们会按照教义的要求欢迎{mf|他|她}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人一动不动，头转向旁边，朝圣殿内的沉寂的空气点了点头。{/n}“是的……是的，真理如同溪流一般，从你的唇间倾泻而出。我们会按照教义的要求欢迎{mf|他|她}。”

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme s'immobilise, la tête tournée de côté, puis il acquiesce comme en réponse au silence ouaté du temple.{/n} « Oui... Oui, la vérité s'écoule de vos lèvres tel un torrent. Nous l'accueillons parmi nous comme l'exigent les préceptes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme s'immobilise, la tête tournée de côté, puis il acquiesce comme en réponse au silence ouaté du temple.{/n} « Oui... Oui, la vérité s'écoule de vos lèvres tel un torrent. Nous l'accueillons parmi nous comme l'exigent les préceptes. »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam hareketsizce duruyor. Kafasını yana çevirerek tapınağın boğuk sessizliğine doğru eğiyor.{/n} "Evet... Evet, hakikat bir akıntı misali dudaklarınızdan dökülüyor. İlkelerin buyurduğu üzere onu memnuniyetle karşılıyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man goes still, his head turned to the side. He nods toward the temple's muffled silence.{/n} "Yes... Yes, truth like a stream pours from your lips. We welcome {mf|him|her} as the Tenets demand."
